title: Post Game: Congress debates Putin’s endgame with Leigh Ann Caldwell
description: As Russia enters a new phase in its invasion of Ukraine, NBC News Capitol Hill correspondent Leigh Ann Caldwell joins Chuck to break down the Congressional battle lines forming over what shape America’s response should take.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
content:encoded: As Russia enters a new phase in its invasion of Ukraine, NBC News Capitol Hill correspondent Leigh Ann Caldwell joins Chuck to break down the Congressional battle lines forming over what shape America’s response should take.
